price: 12. Ir Kas sukūrė visas poras ir paskyrė jums laivus ir galvijus, kuriais jūs jojate:
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مَا تَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī khalaqa al-azwāja kullahā wajaʿala lakum mina al-ful'ki wal-anʿāmi mā tarkabūna
